kiosks a try and get a onetime mile bonus Hello Mr Motley Deltas SelfService CheckIn kiosks can help you save time on your next trip And for a limited time when you use a kiosk youll earn a onetime bonus of miles Heres how imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif SkyMiles Offer imagesemailprogramsskymilesoffergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif imagesspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif The next time youre traveling with a Delta eticket for a domestic flight use Deltas SelfService CheckIn kiosks to check in easily and quickly Available at more than airports throughout the US our enhanced kiosks allow you to check in get your boarding cards for originating and connecting flights request to stand by for upgrades check baggage change flights or seat assignments and provide for multiparty checkin Soon even more kiosks will be available nationwide And whats more the ultimate in checkin convenience now comes with a great mileage bonus The first time you use a kiosk between April and May Delta will give you a onetime bonus of miles Your bonus miles will be posted to your SkyMiles account within two to three weeks after the promotion ends imagesspacergif imagesemailprogramsspacergif
